caption: McDonald‚Äôs is a great place for quick and tasty food. The burgers, fries, and drinks are always fresh and delicious. The place is always full of people, and it has 2 connected floors for seating, which makes it spacious and comfortable. The atmosphere is lively, the taste is amazing, and the service is fast with friendly staff. Perfect spot for friends, family, or a quick meal on the go.
According to the price the not offer good quality specially in range of burgers  new look of maccafe was good nice ambience price was high as compared to the quality and quantity they offer

Located in civil lines near Shubhash Chauraha. Paid parking option is there. At evening there is a little or no place to seat. Now a days digital order system is there, you can directly order by yourself and wait for your order to prepare. All junk foods are available here. Everything a person should avoid. A lot of items are kept for long in freezer. Costly cold drink and bad sitting options. I don't know why people choose such place to go. Service is also not acceptable, you have to do everything by yourself. Even they don't call your name when your item is ready.

I recently visited this McDonald's outlet and had a great time with my friends üòÑ. The food, as always, lived up to expectations‚Äîclassic McAloo Tikki meal and a Korean Spicy Paneer burger üçüüî•. No complaints at all. The service was quick, and the staff were working efficiently and gracefully üôå. It's always inspiring to see such hardworking people, each bringing their own energy and beauty to the place üí´.  What made this visit truly memorable, however, was something‚Äîor rather, someone‚Äîunexpected üí≠. Among the bustling crowd, I noticed a girl who genuinely stood out üíñ. She seemed to be around my age and had this quiet charm that was impossible to ignore üå∏. I looked at her just briefly, twice maybe, but to my surprise, she looked back‚Äîand my friend noticed it too üëÄ. That simple exchange, just a glance, created a small moment of connection in the middle of an ordinary day üåÜ.  I‚Äôm an artist üé®, and sometimes, you come across a face that inspires you‚Äîthat makes you want to capture the essence of it on paper üñåÔ∏è. Hers was one of those rare faces. I wish I had asked her if I could draw her. Not in a weird or forward way‚Äîjust as an artist admiring a fleeting piece of beauty üåà. But our order arrived, and I didn‚Äôt want to make her uncomfortable, so I left it at that and moved on üçî.  Life has its own ways ‚ú®. Maybe if the universe wills it, I‚Äôll cross paths with her again. With just a month left in this city, the thought feels both urgent and poetic ‚è≥üåå.
Liked the new crispy burger. But poor service and atmosphere. It's almost always crowded and the staff is over burdened which leads to bad service. Most kiosks don't work.

I recently visited McDonald's and had a great experience. The food was amazing, with their signature burgers and crispy fries being the highlights. The service was quick and friendly, with the staff being attentive and courteous. The atmosphere was clean and welcoming, making it a great spot for a casual meal with family or friends. The music was upbeat but not overpowering, and the seating area was comfortable.  *Food: 5/5 The burgers were juicy and flavorful, with a perfect balance of toppings. The fries were crispy on the outside and fluffy on the inside. The McFlurry was a great dessert option. *Service: 4/5* The staff were friendly and efficient, with a smile that made our experience even better. *Atmosphere: 5/5* The ambiance was modern and clean, with a fun vibe that made it a great spot for a casual meal.  *Overall: 4/5* I'd definitely recommend McDonald's for a quick and delicious meal. The food was great, the service was excellent, and the atmosphere was welcoming.  Will I go back? Absolutely!

I did not like this restaurant at all. First of all, their food is very poor in quality. The dishes seem old, and the taste is not fresh at all. The presentation is very basic and messy‚Äîlike someone just hurriedly threw it onto the plate. The service is slow and careless; the staff seems rude, and orders do not arrive on time. As for hygiene, the plates and cutlery are clearly not properly clean. The price also feels high for the quality, meaning it‚Äôs a waste of money. Overall, recommending this restaurant is difficult, especially if you like tasty and fresh food.

*1/5 stars*  Visited McDonald's recently and was disappointed with the staff behavior and service. The staff seemed unfriendly and unhelpful. When I asked for table service, I was told that it's self-service and I had to go to the counter to order and collect my food. There was no table number token provided, which made it confusing to manage orders.  The worst part was when the staff seemed put off when I asked for assistance. The overall experience was not pleasant, and I felt that the staff could be more courteous and helpful.  *Suggestions for improvement:*  - Train staff to be more friendly and helpful - Provide clear signage about self-service and table service options - Consider providing table number tokens to manage orders efficiently

I recently visited McDonald‚Äôs and overall, it was a satisfying experience. The service was quick, and the staff was polite and attentive. I ordered a McChicken meal along with fries and a coke. The burger was fresh, the lettuce was crisp, and the bun was soft. As always, the fries were the highlight ‚Äî hot, crispy, and perfectly salted.  However, the place was quite crowded, which made finding a clean table a bit challenging. The ambiance is typical of fast-food chains ‚Äî bright and bustling, not ideal if you‚Äôre looking for a quiet meal.  Price-wise, McDonald‚Äôs remains budget-friendly, making it a good option for a quick bite. They also have many offers on their app, which is a plus.  Overall, if you‚Äôre looking for a quick, tasty, and affordable meal, McDonald‚Äôs delivers. Just don‚Äôt expect gourmet ‚Äî it‚Äôs fast food, and it does that well.  ‚≠ê Rating: 4/5

McDonald's in Pryagraj offers a delightful dining experience that keeps me coming back for more. From the moment you step inside, you're greeted with friendly smiles and a clean, inviting atmosphere. The staff here goes above and beyond to ensure every customer feels welcomed and valued.  The menu boasts a wide array of delicious options, from classic favorites like Big Macs and Chicken McNuggets to more innovative choices like the McSpicy Paneer Burger. No matter what you're craving, McDonald's Pryagraj has something to satisfy your taste buds.  One thing that truly sets this McDonald's apart is its commitment to quality. Every item is prepared with care, using fresh ingredients that never fail to impress. Whether it's the crispy fries or the juicy burgers, you can always count on McDonald's Pryagraj to deliver a top-notch meal.  The restaurant's convenient location and efficient service make it the perfect spot for a quick bite on the go or a leisurely meal with friends and family. Plus, with affordable prices and frequent promotions, dining here won't break the bank.  Overall, McDonald's Pryagraj is a shining example of what a fast-food restaurant should be. With its delicious food, friendly service, and inviting atmosphere, it's no wonder this place has become a favorite among locals and visitors alike.

Today is 10th June 2025, i went to this McDonald's outlet, and ordered 1+1 chicken puff from the main counter, everything went ok till there, after that i was patiently waiting on the receiving side of the counter, i waited for almost 10 mins then i told the male worker to pls check if my order is being processed or not, he said "time lagega", after that i waited for like 20 mins cause everybody else was also waiting and i didn't wanted to feel embarrassed by asking again and again, but after that when i asked again, he ignored me fully, then over the 20 minutes more i asked and him several times and he behaved very bad, i request to take proper action against his rustic and cheap behaviour, after that one lady worker that was preparing the orders inside noticed the chaos and came and took my bill and went inside, and came back and told me that they if i want veg puff instead of chicken puff, that was my limit to hold my patience, i told them to cancel my order and then that male worker spoke "refund ka counter udhar hai" like what ? like he owns the cafe or something, then i went and cancelled my order and took the refund and left. I just wanted to say that what that male worker thinks he is ? I request McDonald's to take proper action towards these bad employees thak single handedly pull down the brand reputation to the drain, also if you don't have ingredients to make some order, just make the person taking orders check and tell that "sir that particular item is currently unavailable" it will save time and unnecessary interaction with you bad staff members. i am giving one star of review because zero option was not there, also you all upgraded the interior of the cafe, but missed the key part that is to hire a well behaved staff, that assist the customer not ignore or misbehave.

My recent visit to McDonald's in Prayagraj Civil Lines was a delightful experience that exceeded my expectations. The standout items that truly impressed me were the burgers and the ice cream with brownie.  The burgers at McDonald's are consistently delicious, and the one I had during my visit was no exception. The patty was perfectly cooked, juicy, and flavorful, while the fresh toppings and soft bun complemented it perfectly. The combination of ingredients created a mouthwatering burger that left me wanting more.  As for the ice cream with brownie, it was a heavenly treat that satisfied my sweet tooth. The rich and creamy ice cream paired beautifully with the warm, gooey brownie, creating a decadent dessert that was simply irresistible. The textures and flavors harmonized perfectly, making it a truly indulgent experience.  The service at McDonald's in Prayagraj Civil Lines was efficient and friendly, adding to the overall positive experience. The staff was attentive and courteous, ensuring that my visit was enjoyable from start to finish.  In conclusion, I highly recommend McDonald's in Prayagraj Civil Lines for its exceptional burgers and delightful ice cream with brownie. The quality of the food, combined with the excellent service, makes this location a standout choice for a satisfying meal or a sweet treat. This McDonald's location definitely deserves a four-star rating for its consistently delicious offerings and welcoming atmosphere.

I recently stopped by my local McDonald's for a quick bite, and it didn't disappoint. The moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm smile by the staff. The restaurant was clean and well-maintained, which is always a plus.  I ordered the signature Big Mac, and it arrived promptly. The special sauce, lettuce, cheese, pickles, and beef patties all combined to create a flavor explosion that hit the spot. The fries were crispy and salty, just the way I like them.  What impressed me most was the efficiency of the service. The staff worked seamlessly together to ensure that orders were fulfilled quickly and accurately.  Overall, my experience at McDonald's was top-notch. The food was delicious, the service was speedy, and the atmosphere was welcoming. Whether you're a fast food fanatic or just need a quick meal on-the-go, McDonald's is a solid choice. Rating: 4/5 stars.

McDonald's is one of the finest fast-food restaurants in the Prayagraj region. The restaurant is a suitable place in the city for casual meals and hanging out with friends and families. Also, it has a team of experts with years of experience in food management. McDonald's is a famous brand and one of the most popular for their burger. The restaurant is renowned for its cleanliness and delicious burger. McDonald's is the leading global foodservice retailer with many Restaurants in India. They also provide online delivery to place their order at minimum prices to savour the best hamburgers at home.  McDonald's is the world's largest fast food restaurant chain, serving over 69 million customers daily in over 100 countries in more than 40,000 outlets as of 2021. McDonald's is best known for its hamburgers, cheeseburgers and french fries, although their menu also includes other items like chicken, fish, fruit, and salads. Their best-selling licensed items are their french fries, followed by the Big Mac. The McDonald's Corporation revenues come from the rent, royalties, and fees paid by the franchisees, as well as sales in company-operated restaurants. McDonald's is the world's second-largest private employer with 1.7 million employees (behind Walmart with 2.3 million employees). As of 2022, McDonald's has the sixth-highest global brand valuation.  McDonald's has been subject to criticism over the health effects of its products, its treatment of employees, and other business practices.  McDonald's has over 36,000 stores in 119 countries and territories, the second-most stores out of all fast food chains worldwide behind only the submarine sandwich chain Subway. They serve almost 54 million people each day.  The first McDonald's restaurant was opened by Richard and Maurice (Mac) McDonald in 1940. It was located on Route 66 in San Bernardino, California. The McDonald brothers later sold their company to Ray Kroc in Des Plaines, Illinois.

This is my disappointment regarding an incident I encountered at your store. When I attempted to enter, the guard stopped me and stated that helmets were not allowed inside. This policy seems both inconvenient and counterproductive, as it alienates customers and creates unnecessary friction.  A helmet is personal property, often carried for safety, especially for those commuting by bike or scooter. Denying entry to customers with helmets is not only inconvenient but also unfair to responsible patrons who simply wish to shop. Such restrictions might deter people from visiting your store, ultimately affecting your customer base and revenue.  I fail to see how such a policy contributes to a welcoming and customer-friendly environment. Growing a business requires fostering goodwill, convenience, and satisfaction‚Äînot imposing rules that frustrate paying customers.  I urge you to reconsider this approach and implement a more customer-centric policy. Providing a secure place for helmets or allowing them inside would demonstrate a commitment to customer comfort and encourage repeat visits.  I hope this feedback is taken constructively, and I look forward to seeing positive changes.
